post.body: man I aint even know they was eatin that good up there. U r blessed sir

I guarantee that Bill Walton will not speak when his son enters the game, out of sheer embarrassment. LOL

Mom: Hey son, how'd you spend Christmas? Son: Same ol, just burned a 100 grand in cash, cuz "i get money"
